titles.title: Monster Strike
monsuto
モンスターストライク
Monster Strike
怪物弹珠

relatedanime.anime: Monster Strike The Movie: Hajimari no Basho e

anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch76461 [Homura Ren] returns to his hometown of Kaminohara after a few years away, yet he possesses no memory of having lived there other than vague flashbacks. When he retrieves his smartphone which he sent to a shop for repairs, he discovers that a mysterious game titled Monster Strike has been installed on it. Then, he suddenly gets attacked by a strange bespectacled man who summons a monster from the game into the real world. Ren`s only chance of getting out of this situation alive is by summoning the dragon http://anidb.net/ch76460 [Oragon], who tells Ren that he will crush the opposing monster for him. Unfortunately, Oragon turns out to be a tiny dragon that seems completely useless! However, soon Ren finds a way to use Oragon in a battle. As he fights, his memory starts returning to him. — written by Singan

externalentity.identifier: モンスターストライク#Web.E3.82.A2.E3.83.8B.E3.83.A1

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: ED variety
tag.description: Several ED sequences in this anime have either a different song or different animation, maybe even to the point of having a unique ED for each episode.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: これが始めのストライク!
This Was the First Strike.
Première attaque !
Kore ga Hajime no Strike!
episode.summary: Ren returns to the town of his childhood, Kaminohara. Strangely, Ren is unable to recall any memories of the town. Meanwhile, his smartphone installs a mysterious game called Monster Strike — heralding the start of a desperate battle! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 指でヒッパレ! オラゴン!
Slingshot Away! Call Me Oragon!
Pas de frondes ! Appelle-moi Oragon !
Yubi de Hippare! Oragon!
episode.summary: Ren is forced into a heated battle with the bestial Fenrir X. Unable to control his companion Oragon and on the verge of defeat, a girl appears before Ren. Who could she be? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 水澤葵
Aoi Mizusawa
Aoi Mizusawa
Mizusawa Aoi
episode.summary: Almost every junior high student in Kaminohara plays Monster Strike. After a brief meeting, Aoi invites Ren to a special place—one where MS players gather. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真夜中のモンストコロシアム
A Night at the Colosseum
Le Colisée Monster Strike de minuit
Mayonaka no Monsto Colosseum
episode.summary: Ren decides to challenge the Colosseum after being inspired by the epic battles between monsters. But Aoi`s a stickler and wants to do things right before joning the fray. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ショッピングモールの決闘!
Mall Brawl
Rixe au centre commercial
Shopping Mall no Kettou!
episode.summary: Ren and Aoi are attacked by a mysterious team of junior high schoolers. Backed into a corner, the two fight back... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 閃光の刃
The Glinting Blade
La Lame scintillante
Senkou no Yaiba
episode.summary: Akira appears, bringing renewed hope to the desperate pair. Unfortunately, he refuses to fight as a team. Can the trio win the battle? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 影月明 勧誘計画!
Operation Recruit Akira
Opération Recruter Akira
Kagetsuki Akira: Kan`yuu Keikaku!
episode.summary: Aoi carries out Operation Recruit Akira—leading to a no-holds-barred blitz aimed at persuading Akira to rejoin the team. Is success around the corner? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 邪眼でも若葉皆実だぞ!
Evil Eye Minami
L’Œil du Mal de Minami
Jagan demo Wakaba Minami Da zo!
episode.summary: Ren and the others set out to convince Minami to rejoin the team. They find a cursing Minami in the midst of a ferocious battle. Can Aoi manage to recruit Minami? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 葵の恥ずかしすぎる動画!
SOS! A Shocking Video?!
La Vidéo Divulguée d’Aoi !
Aoi no Hazukashisugiru Douga!
episode.summary: Minami has decided to destroy Aoi outside of Monster Strike. As announced, Minami uploads a shocking video of Aoi. Can they stop the out-of-control Minami? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 商店街戦線異状あり
Shopfront Shocker
Horreur dans la Vitrine
Shoutengai Sensen Ijou Ari
episode.summary: The team challenges Minami in a bid to remove the embarassing video. While being pushed back by Minami`s aggression, something becomes clear... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 皆実, 仲間入ったってよ
Welcome, Minami!
Bienvenue, Minami !
Minami, Nakama Haittatte yo
episode.summary: After the victorious battle, Ren and Aoi welcome the no-longer-possessed Minami into the team. To form a team of four, Aoi once again asks Akira but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オラゴン危機一発!
Ora-gone?!
Où-ragon ?
Oragon Kikiippatsu!
episode.summary: Is there a connection between Oragon and the possessed?! The team harbors doubts about Oragon while investigating his secret.. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超絶降臨
Impossible Task
Tâche impossible
Chouzetsu Kourin
episode.summary: There may be a connection between MS Coliseum and the strange happenings in Kaminohara. To investigate, the team sneaks into the coliseum. There an ominous shadow appears... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イザナミ死す
Izanami
Izanami
Izanami Shisu
episode.summary: Akira’s fine play should have turned the tables, but the dark aura surrounding Izanami Zero pushes the team to despair. It’s a do-or-die situation! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反攻のストライクショット
Counter! A Strike Shot for the Ages!
Riposte ! Un des strike shot du siècle !
Hankou no Strike Shot
episode.summary: Kamui goes berserk, and Fox Metal falls out of the ring. Doom`s strength devastates the entire party. All appears lost, until Ren begins to figure out the rules. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闘神降臨
Beware the Warrior God
Attention au dieu guerrier
Toushin Kourin
episode.summary: The deathmatch against Izanami Zero has ended, but a new threat appears. Who is K (King), and what is he aiming for? And a warrior god appears?! The curtains rise, unveiling a new season of Monster Strike the Animation! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 記憶の秘密
Pieces of Memories
Bribes de Mémoire
Kioku no Himitsu
episode.summary: Ren and his team manage to escape from Doom`s grasp. Monster Strike and all the strange happenings associated with it leaves the gang with more questions than answers. K`s prophetic words linger—"The answers lie in your past." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 春馬を探せ
Where Art Thou, Haruma?
Où es-Tu, Haruma ?
Haruma o Sagase
episode.summary: The team searches for Haruma in Shibuya. A gigantic monster gate appears. As Ren and friends prepare for a throwdown, a mysterious attack destroys the monsters. Could it be, Haruma? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 殲滅のルシファー
Lucy the Annihilator
Lucy l’Exterminatrice
Senmetsu no Lucifer
episode.summary: The team is locked in a desperate battle against Underworld Rebel Lucy. Blasted by a fiery energy circle, they fire off their Strike Shots, only to be denied by an impervious barrier. How will the dice fall? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光るストライクリング
From the Ring, Hope
De la Bague vient l’Espoir
Hikaru Strike Ring
episode.summary: Haruma`s words stab at the hearts of Ren and his friends. After their crushing defeat at Haruma`s hands, the team lies broken. Amid the gloom, the strike ring glows —a faint flicker of hope that brings the promise of a new meeting.

episode.title: きたれ! モンスト部
Come One and All: MS Club
Kitare! Monsto Bu
episode.summary: Haruma`s on a different level. To meet him again, Minami announces the creation of Club MS —all in the name of reaching the top in Kaminohara. However, the student council`s president may have a few complaints...

episode.title: 秘剣! 桜吹雪
The Saber Amid the Blossoms
Hiken! Sakura Fubuki
episode.summary: Ryoma`s on the ropes, unable to display his true power. Ren`s time to shine has come to an abrupt end, but behind him the calvalry arrives. Aoi and Napoleon attack head-on and begin to turn the tables. Will it be enough to snatch victory from defeat?

episode.title: 天邪神ダークゼウス
Dark Usurper Zeus
Ten Jashin Dark Zeus
episode.summary: - From the heavens... - Ren`s vowed to bring out Ryoma`s potential, but is once again pushed back by an enemy stronger than Sakura—Dark Usurper Zeus. With even Kamui and Napoleon struggling, Ren remembers words Akira has spoken in the past. And then...?

episode.title: 森の歌姫リボン
Melodious Snow Bow
Mori no Utahime Ribbon
episode.summary: - Here`s a bow, tied right on your heart. - After a furious succession of battles, the gang finds themselves resting at Minamikaze. But there, an out-of-control Akane storms onto the scene?! To stop her, a battle begins, but there the first notes of a concert unfold.

episode.title: 炎の闘神ニルヴァーナ
Nirvana, Inferno of War
Honoo no Toushin Nirvana
episode.summary: - It`s always a party! - The age of idols ends with Ren and the rest intact. They`ve managed to avoid Snow Bow, but instead of disappearing, the field becomes consumed by fire. From the depths of the inferno, a mysterious presence appears!

episode.title: アスに向かって撃て!
Assemble, Assault, and Assail
Asu ni Mukatte Ute!
episode.summary: - It`s always a party! - The team is barely staying afloat against Nirvana. Their attacks are ineffective and laughed away by the drunken Battle God. It`s taking everything they have to stay one step ahead. In a stroke of luck, a ray of light is assessed in the shape of a hole in a strange place.

episode.title: ゲスなダブルデート
An Accidental Double Date
Gesu na Double Date
episode.summary: - Finally, his golden age?! - Ren is invited by both Aoi and Minami to go out shopping for their victory celebration. In a stroke of stupidity, Ren manages to double book both of the girls. How will he manage to escape from his perilous situation?

episode.title: 再び渋谷へ
Booya! Return to Shibuya
Futatabi Shibuya e
episode.summary: - Don`t even think about touching Haruma! - The team returns to Shibuya with Taiyo and his team. There they reunite with Haruma. However, Haruma refuses to speak and dissapears, leaving behind a new enemy in his wake.

episode.title: アリス・イン・マッドランド
Alice in a Mad Wonderland
Alice in Mad Land
episode.summary: - I`ll cut you into cute, tiny, bite-sized pieces. - Alice`s gatling gun and deadly trump minions push back Minami`s Dead Rabbits. The Rabbits manage to strike back. But instead of weakening, Alice becomes crazed and rips off a maniacal strike shot!

episode.title: 神託の巫女
The Scarlet Shrine Maiden
Shintaku no Miko
episode.summary: - Divine words hold great power! - An insane battle featuring Himiko`s golem and Napoleon`s rabbit army ensues. A flurry of lasers and explosions rock the battlefield. The scene then shifts to Akira and Taiyo battling against Kaoru. A demonic shadow materializes before Kamui and Loki...

episode.title: 神の刃と悪魔の銃口
Blade Versus Gun
Kami no Yaiba to Akuma no Juukou
episode.summary: - Return to ash... - Kamui is overpowered by Romeo`s onslaught. Napoleon takes the full brunt of Himiko`s strike shot. Even with the odds against them, Akira and Aoi continue fighting. They gather their strength for one final push, all for the sake of meeting Haruma again.

episode.title: 千のバハムート
The Flock of Bahamut
Sen no Bahamut
episode.summary: - One thousand?! - Lucy appears once more, jacking the entire city. A sinister smile signals the coming of a swarm of Bahamuts. As crows change to dragons, the skies of Shibuya are covered in darkness.

episode.title: 不滅のドラゴンスピリット
The Indomitable Dragon
Fumetsu no Dragon Spirit
episode.summary: - I`ll protect my friends and Haruma! - The gang battles desperately, fighting for their very own survival. Yet the enemy is simply too powerful. One by one, they reach the limits of their strength. In the end, only Ren is left standing. Ren`s determination to protect his friends and Haruma resonate, awakening a new bond with Ryoma...

episode.title: 龍馬vsルシファー
Ryoma vs Lucy
Ryouma vs Lucy
episode.summary: - I`ve trained—and now I`m here to see you again. - Ryoma sweeps the flock of a thousand Bahamuts in one fell swoop. In front of him appears Lucy and Haruma. Another deathmatch begins...

episode.title: 死を想え
Death`s Embrace
Shi o Omoe
episode.summary: - He`s the one who killed me, your mother... - The indomitable dragon and fallen angel clash, lighting up the city. Both refuse to give an inch. Haruma struggles, torn between memory and reality. A mysterious shimmer appears...

episode.title: 夏スペシャル: マーメイド・ラプソディ
Summer Special: Mermaid Rhapsody
Natsu Special: Mermaid Rhapsody
episode.summary: Minami`s father, a former mercenary, is invited to an American naval party. Ren and the gang end up heading to Okinawa with him for summer break. On a sandy beach, Ren meets a mysterious girl. "Help me..." The girl leaves Ren with those words as she disappears. Ren is drawn to the girl and the meaning of those words. He makes it his mission to save her, and uncover the truth. Who is the girl? Why did she ask Ren for help? The girl`s true identity slowly unveils...

episode.title: 彼岸花の牢獄
The Imprisoned Lily
Higanbana no Rougoku
episode.summary: - I will not let you have Haruma... - Memento Mori, the Spirit of War, shows herself to be the cause behind Haruma`s pain. Ryoma holds the elemental advantage, fire against wood. As Ryoma moves in to finish the battle in one blow, a fog obstructs his path...

episode.title: 黒の坂本龍馬
In Darkness, Ryoma
Kuro no Sakamoto Ryouma
episode.summary: - Come to your senses, Haruma Kagutsuchi! - Shino, Mariko, and Kaoru rise against Memento Mori to rescue Haruma. Romeo, Alice, and Himiko`s bump combos push back Memento Mori. However, in the field appears a black coffin...

episode.title: Kの真実
The Truth of K
K no SHinjitsu
episode.summary: - We were friends... - It becomes apparent that the one who sent Memento Mori was none other than K, who reveals himself to be Genma, Haruma`s father. Why did the Warrior Gods appear? What is their connection to the happenings in Kaminohara? Genma reveals his ambitions...

episode.title: 明と春馬
Akira and Haruma
Akira to Haruma
episode.summary: - I wanted to apologize for that time... - After discovering K`s ambitions, Ren and the rest of the gang return to Kaminohara. Telling Haruma that he wants to check on something, Akira heads to the hospital where Haruma`s mother lies in a coma.

episode.title: 結成!リボン親衛隊?
Gather in Kaminohara!
Kessei! Ribbon Shin`eitai?
episode.summary: - You need help? I`m there! - K is attempting to open another monster gate. To prevent K`s plans from succeeding, the gang heads to a physics research facility. Taiyo and Shino join up in search of clues.

episode.title: XFLAG PARK
XFLAG Park
XFLAG Park
episode.summary: The gang arrives for XFLAG PARK. They have a blast at the venue, but they forget their original goal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 八雲立つ 逢魔の夜
The Sun Sets on Orochi
Yakumo Tatsu: Ouma no Yoru
episode.summary: - Ren Homura... I`ve found you. - In Kaminohara, Haruma sets out to find clues of Shino`s whereabouts after her sudden disappearance. Ren and friends join in the search, but they come upon a giant snake who strikes without warning.

episode.title: 八岐ノ森の贄比女
An Offering to Orochi
Yahata no Mori no Niehime
episode.summary: - Dance until you break! - Kushinada`s warps and cross laser put the gang on the defensive. Napoleon is defeated, while Ryoma and Alice are hanging on by a thread. But not all is lost, as Minami discovers a nifty trick...

episode.title: 古き世界の終わり
An End to the Past
Furuki Sekai no Owari
episode.summary: - We`ve been here in the past. - Kushinada has been defeated and Shino rescued—but at what cost? Monster Strike has spilled into the real world, leaving damage in its wake. Before the dust has settled, a message from Haruma arrives. He has found the physics research facility...

episode.title: 封印の破壊神 バベル
World Ender Babel
Fuuin no Hakaishin Babel
episode.summary: - A despair deeper than death... - Babel has escaped the now destroyed physics research center. Now, it terrorizes the residents of Kaminohara. What did Babel mean by "a despair deeper than death"?

episode.title: 白衣の天使, 降臨
The Descent of Angels
Hakui no Tenshi, Kourin
episode.summary: - These memories... they`re ours! - To reclaim Haruma`s memories, the gang stands up to Babel. But Babel has only one target: Ren. Ignoring Ryoma and the rest of the monsters` attacks, Babel continues to aim for Ren. In the midst of the chaos, an "Angel" descends...

episode.title: 混沌のジグラート
Ziggurat of Chaos
Konton no Ziggurat
episode.summary: - Feel the pain that I have felt! - Ren and friends level their resolve against Babel. Into the fray enters Himiko, Alice, and Romeo! The situation shifts and Oragon now finds himself the target of Babel`s wrath...

episode.title: オルタナティブドラゴンの記憶
Oraternative Memories
Alternative Dragon no Kioku
episode.summary: - Do you believe in destiny? - A petrifying attack hits Oragon as he makes a stand. Oragon, on his last dregs of strength, begins to glow. A light flashes, parting to reveal the depths of Oragon`s memories...

episode.title: 光の闘神 カルマ
Karma, Light of War
Hikari no Toushin Karma
episode.summary: - The memories of humans are so beautiful... - Karma, the Light of War appears. Ren and friends battle to reclaim their memories, but there`s something about Karma`s arms...

episode.title: 神の光, 神の炎
Of Light and Flame
Kami no Hikari, Kami no Honoo
episode.summary: - Harken the light! - Attacking Karma is a double-edged sword—the party gets increasingly weak due to Karma`s debuffs. Akira realizes a path to victory and dashes forward with Kamui, only to be cut down by Karma. Left with no options, Akira is handed a smartphone by Genma. He prepares to strike...

episode.title: 終わりと始まりのストライクショット
Strike Shot! An End and New Beginnings
Owari to Hajimari no Strike Shot
episode.summary: - We`ll defeat you and reclaim everything! - Ren is thrown into despair as he is confronted with the amnesiac Aoi, Minami, and Akira. However, a familiar voice emerges from his smartphone. With smartphone in hand, Ren calls on the last remnants of his strength and goes toe to toe against Karma!

episode.title: 映画公開スペシャル: レイン・オブ・メモリーズ
Winter Special: Rain of Memories
Eiga Koukai Special: Rain of Memories
episode.summary: - They deserve better. Someone better than me... - The stage is set one year before Ren arrives in Kaminohara. Akira has moved to Kaminohara from Sendai, all for the sake of revenge. The wounds that his sister suffered in an MS battle fuel his vengeance. A lost Haruma is given directions by Akira, revealing a caring side to the usually cold and calculating teen. Haruma observes Akira`s violent MS battles, and realizes that Akira fights while reading his enemies` attacks. Haruma proposes the idea of recruiting Akira to his teammates, Aoi and Minami. Surprised and naturally reluctant, Aoi and Minami decide to trust Haruma. For Haruma has resisted recruiting the fourth member of their team, saving the spot for the right person...
